rules_text:
When Mimic of the Ox enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
When Mimic of the Ox dies, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Always searching for answers, the shamans have delved into the minds of animals. One has chosen the ox, striving to understand its stubborn determination.[/i]
